tenancy.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the period of time that someone rents a house, land etc
tenancy.translation[0].definitions[1].de: the right to use a house, land etc that is rented
tenancy.translation[1].definitions[0].de: an agreement which gives someone the right to use a building, land etc for which they have paid rent
tenancy.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The amount of rent you have to pay will depend on the type of tenancy you have.
We are applying for a new tenancy of the premises.
tenancy.translation[1].definitions[1].de: the period of time that someone rents a building, land etc
